languages.text: "На связи — отряд Енхо Сона. Мы продолжаем движение" — вновь раздался голос. Теперь казалось, что он звучал со всех сторон, приближаясь слева и справа и из-под пола и даже откуда-то из глубины копошащихся кабелей.

traits.locale_text: "На связи — отряд Енхо Сон. Мы продолжаем движение" — вновь раздался голос. Теперь казалось, что он звучит со всех сторон, приближаясь слева и справа и из-под пола и даже откуда-то из глубины копошащихся кабелей.

languages.text: "Sohn here. Unit 1 proceeding to the bridge," said the voice again. Now it seemed to be coming from all sides, drawing in from the left and the right, from under the deck and even from somewhere among the mess of cables overhead.
languages.original_text: "На связи — отряд Енхо Сона. Мы продолжаем движение" — вновь раздался голос. Теперь казалось, что он звучал со всех сторон, приближаясь слева и справа и из-под пола и даже откуда-то из глубины копошащихся кабелей.

traits.locale_text: "Sohn here. Unit 1 proceeding to the bridge," said the voice again. Now it seemed to be coming from all sides, drawing in from the left and the right, from under the deck and even from somewhere among the mess of cables overhead.

"Sohn here. Unit 1 proceeding to the bridge," said the voice again. Now it seemed to be coming from all sides, drawing in from the left and the right, from under the deck and even from somewhere among the mess of cables overhead.

"Sohn here. Unit 1 proceeding to the bridge," said the voice again. Now it seemed to be coming from all sides, drawing in from the left and the right, from under the deck and even from somewhere among the mess of cables overhead.

"Sohn here. Unit 1 proceeding to the bridge," said the voice again. Now it seemed to be coming from all sides, drawing in from the left and the right, from under the deck and even from somewhere among the mess of cables overhead.

languages.text: «Aquí Sohn. La unidad 1 se dirige al puente», dijo la voz una vez más. El sonido parecía venir de todas las direcciones: de la izquierda, de la derecha, desde debajo de la cubierta e incluso de la maraña de cables que había encima.
languages.original_text: "Sohn here. Unit 1 proceeding to the bridge," said the voice again. Now it seemed to be coming from all sides, drawing in from the left and the right, from under the deck and even from somewhere among the mess of cables overhead.

traits.locale_text: «Aquí Sohn. La unidad 1 se dirige al puente», dijo la voz una vez más. El sonido parecía venir de todas las direcciones: de la izquierda, de la derecha, desde debajo de la cubierta e incluso de la maraña de cables que había encima.

languages.text: “这里是宋永和，一号小队目前正在前往舰桥。”那个声音再次响了起来。这次，这个声音似乎是从四面八方响起来的——左边、右边，甲板下面，甚至像是从头顶上密密麻麻的电缆中传来的。
languages.original_text: "Sohn here. Unit 1 proceeding to the bridge," said the voice again. Now it seemed to be coming from all sides, drawing in from the left and the right, from under the deck and even from somewhere among the mess of cables overhead.

traits.locale_text: “这里是宋永和，一号小队目前正在前往舰桥。”那个声音再次响了起来。这次，这个声音似乎是从四面八方响起来的——左边、右边，甲板下面，甚至像是从头顶上密密麻麻的电缆中传来的。

languages.text: 「ソンです。1番隊はブリッジへ向かっています」と再び声が聞こえた。今度はまるで四方八方からきているようだ。左右から、デッキの下から、それでに頭上のゴチャついたケーブルの中のどこかからも出ているようだ。
languages.original_text: "Sohn here. Unit 1 proceeding to the bridge," said the voice again. Now it seemed to be coming from all sides, drawing in from the left and the right, from under the deck and even from somewhere among the mess of cables overhead.

traits.locale_text: 「ソンです。1番隊はブリッジへ向かっています」と再び声が聞こえた。今度はまるで四方八方からきているようだ。左右から、デッキの下から、それでに頭上のゴチャついたケーブルの中のどこかからも出ているようだ。

languages.text: "Hier Sohn. Einheit 1 unterwegs zur Brücke", wiederholte die Stimme. Jetzt schien sie von allen Seiten zu kommen, von links und rechts, von unter dem Deck und sogar aus den vielen Kabeln an der Decke.
languages.original_text: "Sohn here. Unit 1 proceeding to the bridge," said the voice again. Now it seemed to be coming from all sides, drawing in from the left and the right, from under the deck and even from somewhere among the mess of cables overhead.

traits.locale_text: "Hier Sohn. Einheit 1 unterwegs zur Brücke", wiederholte die Stimme. Jetzt schien sie von allen Seiten zu kommen, von links und rechts, von unter dem Deck und sogar aus den vielen Kabeln an der Decke.

languages.text: « Ici Sohn. L'unité 1 arrive à la passerelle, » répéta la voix. Elle semblait maintenant venir de toutes parts. Sa source paraissait se trouver aussi bien à gauche qu'à droite, sous le pont et même dans l'amas de câbles au plafond.
languages.original_text: "Sohn here. Unit 1 proceeding to the bridge," said the voice again. Now it seemed to be coming from all sides, drawing in from the left and the right, from under the deck and even from somewhere among the mess of cables overhead.

traits.locale_text: « Ici Sohn. L'unité 1 arrive à la passerelle, » répéta la voix. Elle semblait maintenant venir de toutes parts. Sa source paraissait se trouver aussi bien à gauche qu'à droite, sous le pont et même dans l'amas de câbles au plafond.

languages.text: "Ben Sohn. 1. Birim, köprüye intikal ediyor." Ses yeniden konuşmuştu. Dört bir yandan yükseliyor gibiydi... Sağ sol fark etmeksizin, güvertenin altından ve hatta tepedeki kablo yığının arasından bir yerden yükseliyordu sanki.
languages.original_text: "Sohn here. Unit 1 proceeding to the bridge," said the voice again. Now it seemed to be coming from all sides, drawing in from the left and the right, from under the deck and even from somewhere among the mess of cables overhead.

traits.locale_text: "Sohn konuşuyor. 1. Birim, köprüye intikal ediyor," ses yeniden konuşmuştu. Dört bir yandan yükseliyor gibiydi… Sağ sol fark etmeksizin, güvertenin altından ve hatta tepedeki kablo yığının arasından bir yerden yükseliyordu sanki.
